hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -q 'secrets.h'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Cannot edit secrets.h - contains WiFi credentials'; exit 1; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'pio run[^-]|pio run$' && [ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_STATUS" = "0" ]; then echo '--- Auto-flashing ---'; pio run -t upload 2>&1 | tail -15; fi
